content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":415310,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4cf03c8c-c320-4372-83a3-0ad9fac600e2/first day.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4cf03c8c-c320-4372-83a3-0ad9fac600e2/first day.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"first day.PNG\",\"name\":\"first day.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"4cf03c8c-c320-4372-83a3-0ad9fac600e2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":881,\"height\":285},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We would really like to make the process of your onboarding friendly, comfortable and enjoyable!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Earlier you've received the \\\"Welcome to EPAM\\\" email, so you already know where and at what time your first EPAM day begins.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.\\tIt starts in EPAM Onboarding center where you'll receive your account credentials to set up your EPAM account, and start your onboarding journey!  Don’t forget to take a photo for EPAM internal systems.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.\\tLater you will get acquainted with the People Management Team – whose aim is to help you integrate into EPAM and provide you informational support during the probation period. You’ll have an HR Induction which is a  brief introduction to EPAM, its internal tools, systems and rules.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.\\tFinal step for your first day is to meet your Resource Manager. Get your first tasks and enjoy being part of the global EPAM team.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":5680,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f9211171-b865-412b-99fb-798e7ea68d73/Capture (1).png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f9211171-b865-412b-99fb-798e7ea68d73/Capture (1).png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Capture (1).png\",\"name\":\"Capture (1).png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f9211171-b865-412b-99fb-798e7ea68d73\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":450,\"height\":88},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The world has changed, and our offices change too. The office today is no longer a place where people need to be tied to the same workplace with their team. You can work in hybrid working mode and visit the office a few days per week for collaboration. Our temporary office is on 53, Solonos st, 10672, Athens on the 2nd floor\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are two types of working scenarios:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Work from office (WFO)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - you work from the office, and have a workplace assigned to you due to the nature of your work or job(clients) requirements, or you have no ability to work from home.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hybrid work(both from home & office)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"-you have the flexibility of shifting from WFH or WFO scenarios to build your own work schedule (both from office or from home) based on the nature of your work -project or job function requirements.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":6317,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9edb0a0a-f24b-439e-b159-3410339a75f2/access card.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9edb0a0a-f24b-439e-b159-3410339a75f2/access card.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"access card.png\",\"name\":\"access card.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"9edb0a0a-f24b-439e-b159-3410339a75f2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":401,\"height\":80},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case you want to visit the office, send an email to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:EPAMPeopleTeamGR@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAMPeopleTeamGR@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and your local HR, to prepare a visitor’s badge which you will receive from the reception of the building upon arrival.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please note that your badge does not have your name or photograph, and you will have to return it upon your departure.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"size\":5815,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/eff63376-a952-4e4e-b885-fa9e308e93a8/duo.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/eff63376-a952-4e4e-b885-fa9e308e93a8/duo.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"duo.PNG\",\"name\":\"duo.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"eff63376-a952-4e4e-b885-fa9e308e93a8\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":877,\"height\":60},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
